pr_title: KOGITO-3299 Index Job endpoint url in Data Index

timeline.message: KOGITO-3299 Index Job endpoint url in Data Index

timeline.bodyText: @nmirasch @tiagodolphine I had to change this because Intellij was not picking up the correct compiler level locally. In theory, this should not have any impact as we already use version 11 anyway.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: I faced the same issue on a different PR, I was keeping this locally, so that's fine to insert this IMO.
replies.author: tiagodolphine
